artist: Artist: Siobhan; Publisher: Pep Girlz, New York
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, photomechanical illustration of two figures with text and designs printed in offset lithography with red details on coated paper covers; 32 pp.
inscription: Front cover, blue ink pen: To: FLY! LooBRICKATE / YUH MIND / WID DIS!!! / LUV & Kisses! SIOBHAN (doodle)
medium: Red and black-and-white offset lithography; bound volume
title: Pep Girlz
